name: nyc_dot.road_camera_events
description: This table contains all events captured by NYC Department of Transportation road cameras.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of a road camera event.

columns.name: camera_id
columns.description: ID of the camera that captured the event.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name or description of the event.

columns.name: address
columns.description: Address where the event was captured.

columns.name: lat
columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the camera location.

columns.name: lon
columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the camera location.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the event was recorded.

columns.name: params
columns.description: Additional parameters of the event in a key-value JSON format.
